nodes.text: A female Human was the sister of Onya Oruel, living on Tatooine during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY Onya was kidnapped by the Twin Suns slavers while on her sister's moisture farm, though she was rescued and safely returned home a week later.

Onya Oruel's sister is mentioned in the letter Onya sends to the player after her release. Although Onya herself is not identified during the rescue, all captives freed during the mission are Human females.
